alert.note: Alert for Irion (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 7:22PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Irion County through 800 PM CDT... At 721 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorms from Barnhart to 5 miles south of Mertzon, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mertzon, Sherwood and Barnhart. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
